input.sentences: lovely two car garage so no one is fighting over the space
great yard so the kids can run around
not in love with the panel but have all kinds of ideas
and who does n't love a fireplace . this is a great choice !
output.sentences: I was leaving home, driving down my driveway.
This space includes a lovely garage.
The yard is large enough for kids to run.
These are the kinds of wood panels that I love.
My choice is this fireplace which is surrounded by the wood panel that I love.
